name: Glocusent 106 LED Camping Lights, Up to 80Hrs, 5000mAh Camping Lantern Rechargeable with 5 Brightness 3 Modes & SOS, IP68 Waterproof, Max 1200LM, Lanterns for Power Outages Hiking Emergency Hurricane
short_description: [Military-Grade Rugged and Reliable] This compact rechargeable lantern is built to military-grade standards for the harshest environments: 1. With a true IP68 waterproof rating, it works flawlessly under 1.5-meter water, making it reliable during heavy rain, river crossings, or unexpected drops into water; 2. Its reinforced housing has endured repeated 40 inches military-grade drop tests, ensuring outstanding impact resistance on rocky terrain; 3. Exceptional visibility in thick fogs and adverse weather with anti-fog mode; 4. The integrated SOS mode for emergencies. Perfect emergency light for power outages and the tough outdoors.

[Ultra Bright 1200LM & 5 Brightness Levels] With 106 LEDs evenly distributed 360° covering the entire lantern body, the LED lantern illuminates your surroundings with exceptional brightness and uniformity, eliminating any shadows for clearer views. 5 brightness dimmable for your various lighting needs. 1200LM "Super Bright" mode illuminates for 3 minutes, covering a larger area in emergencies if necessary. Essential outdoor lanterns for the darkest & stormiest nights.

[Rechargeable & Long Lasting] Our battery powered lantern is rechargeable, meaning no more battery waste. The USB-C port allows it to be charged from small solar or typical plug-in portable power banks when away from your car or home. The built-in 5000mAh battery can last for 80 hrs (at lowest brightness), making it powerful enough for a solid weekend camping trip, emergencies, and power outages caused by hurricanes & storms.

[3 Light Modes & SOS Mode] We design this battery lantern with 4 light modes to suit your needs, including 3000K, 4000K,6000K & SOS mode. Specifically, the 3000K is mainly for lighting in the thick fog; the 4000K is for walking or hiking; the 6000K is for repairing or illuminating a broader area like a tent or campsite. Customize your camping light to suit your surroundings better.

[Ultra Compact Size] At a mere 2.2 x 2.2 x 5.6 inches, it is even more compact than a 330ml soda can. Weighing in at a mere 8.5 ounces, the lantern lamp is lighter than a 250ml bottle of water. Its diminutive size makes it an ideal addition to your hiking backpack, especially when every inch and every ounce counts. Don't hesitate to get this small yet powerful rechargeable lantern for emergencies.

[WHAT YOU GET] 1. 24/7 Online services. 2. 30-day return service and a 2-year warranty. 3. Original patented design and FCC, CE, RoHS, PSE & C-TICK certified. 4. Packing list: Glocusent 1*Camping Lantern,1*Charging Cable,1*User Manual.

short_description: [Brighten Your Entire Campsite] With 135 upgraded LEDs, this camping lights floods 360° with ultra-bright, shadow-free light covering 200ft². Five dimmable brightness levels allow you to choose the perfect glow for any situation—whether camping, hiking, night fishing, hosting a backyard BBQ, or handling an unexpected emergency, you'll never be left in the dark with our lanterns for power outages.

[Up to 200H of Light] With a built-in 5000mAh rechargeable battery, our camping lantern can last up to 200 hours on low, and a full charge takes just 3.5 hours. It's perfect for multi-day camping trips, overnight hikes, or power outages at home, ensuring you're ready for your next adventure. Note: You can charge the lantern using the included USB-C to C cable or any USB-A to C charging cable.

[3 Color Modes for Every Scenario]: The lantern offers 3 color modes that adapt to every situation. Switch between 3000K warm light for foggy conditions or cozy family moments, 4500K neutral light for reading or hiking, and 6000K cool white for crisp, energizing illumination—ideal lanterns for studying, tasks, or clear outdoor visibility.

[Emergency Ready] Designed with safety in mind, the led lantern features a 1500LM super bright mode for instant wide-area lighting, an SOS red strobe to signal for help, and a Type-C port to charge your phone, keeping you connected and visible during storms, roadside emergencies, or unexpected power outages.

[Built Tough for the Outdoors] Compact, lightweight (1.5Oz/299g), and IP44 waterproof, this lantern lamp is ready for rain, dust, and rugged adventures. Take it camping, fishing, RVing, or keep it in your car or home emergency kit—reliable light wherever you go.

[Effortless Everyday Use] 1: Peace of mind with 24-month warranty & hassle-free customer service. 2: FCC, CE, UL, RoHS, PSE, C-TICK certified. 3.Package includes: 1*Glocusent Camping Lantern,1* USB-C to C Charging Cable,1*User Manual (The adapter is not included). 4: Large sunken buttons for quick operation, even in the dark. The memory function recalls your last setting, while the top handle and bottom hook let you hang, carry, or place the rechargeable camping lantern anywhere you need reliable light.
